title: Virus and Vaccine Update, Retail Bounce Slows, Long Recovery for Airlines
itunes:title: Virus and Vaccine Update, Retail Bounce Slows, Long Recovery for Airlines
description:
Dr. Ian Lustbader, Clinical Professor of Medicine at NYU, shares his thoughts on reopening schools amid the pandemic and the race for a vaccine. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Health Care Reporter Robert Langreth break down the magazine story "Moderna Wants to Transform the Body Into Vaccine-Making Machine." Bloomberg Economics Senior U.S. Economist Yelena Shulyatyeva explains that rebound in U.S. retail sales slowed in July as coronavirus infections surged. Helane Becker, Senior Research Analyst at Cowen Research Group, discusses seeing a 3-5 year recovery for airlines. And we Drive to the Close with Scott Kubie, Senior Investment Strategist at The Carson Group.

Hosts: Paul Sweeney and Alix Steel. Producer: Paul Brennan

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
